all.Name: Ball Chair
all.Body:
The Ball Chair was designed in 1963 and debuted at the Cologne Furniture Fair in 1966. The chair is one of the most famous and beloved classics of Finnish design and it was the international breakthrough of Eero Aarnio. The Ball Chair can be found in the collections of design museums around the world and it has starred in several movies, music videos and magazine covers.

The Ball Chair is made from fibreglass and upholstered with quality fabrics. There are 12 colour options to choose from.

We are happy to provide you fabric samples to help you decide the perfect colour for your Ball Chair. You can find our contact information here.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

all.Name: Bubble
all.Body:
The Bubble chair was designed by Eero Aarnio in 1968. According to Eero’s notes, the Bubble hangs from the ceiling because ‘there is no nice way to make a clear pedestal.’ It shares the same unique acoustics as the Ball Chair, a little cocoon that shields off the outside world.

The hanging Bubble chair is made from acrylic and solid stainless steel, and is available in four different leather options by Sørensen Leather.

We are happy to provide you leather samples to help you decide the perfect colour for your Bubble. You can find our contact information here.

The Bubble Chair (1968) is made from transparent acrylic with a stainless steel ring. Dimensions: 103 cm width x 90 cm depth x 105 cm height

Read more about the Bubble chair and its story here.

all.Name: Copacabana
all.Body:
The Copacabana was designed to go with the Pastil chair; the curved line of the table suits the round shape of the chair. Copacabana can be used as both a table or a small bench. The material makes it suitable for outdoor use. Eero Aarnio designed Copacabana in 1991.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

all.Name: Formula
all.Body:
The Formula chair is similar to the classic Pastil, with an additional backrest. It is the response to Eero’s own personal challenge to combine the sculptural elements of his earlier fibreglass designs with the ergonomic solutions for comfortable seating. Formula was designed in 1998 by Eero Aarnio.

The Formula is available in three colors: black, white and red.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

all.Name: Gift Card
all.Body: How about gifting the freedom to decide which of our classics speaks to you the most? Purchase a gift card for a friend or use it yourself for your favourite Original! You can use the Aarnio Originals gift card for payment in our aarniooriginals.com web shop. Gift card is delivered to your email address, and includes a unique code that is valid for payment in our web shop for 12 months after purchase. When you want to use gift card for payment, you will need to add your gift card code at checkout, and the value of the gift card will be deducted from the total amount. In case a part of the gift card’s value is left unused, you can use what is left with your next order.

all.Name: Kisu
all.Body:
Kisu is the newest addition to our collection, designed by Eero Aarnio in 2020. Kisu is a decorative piece of interior design suitable for both indoors and outdoors. This cat is made of polyethylene and available in two colours, black and white. The black Kisu is produced 100% of regenerated polyethylene made from the factory's own defected products and waste material. Kindly note that Kisu is a decoration element, not a toy.

Delivery time is two weeks. Kisu has a 14 days exchange and return policy.

all.Name: Leather Ball Chair
all.Body:
The Ball Chair designed in 1963 by Eero Aarnio is one of the most iconic pieces of furniture of the past decades. Still today, it has remained as fresh and modern as ever. For years we have received requests about the possibility of upholstering the iconic Ball chair with leather. The premium version of the iconic classic is finally available. The Leather Ball Chair is upholstered with the finest and softest leather, enabling the most elegant and luxurious finishing touch. Get your own upgraded classic now, and bring the look that radiates luxury to your living room.

We are happy to provide you leather samples.
You can find our contact information here.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

all.Name: Mini KISU
all.Body:
Mini KISU introduces the iconic shape of our bestseller Kisu in a new ceramic material in two luxurious colours - gold and platinum. The golden KISU is a limited series of 1500 pieces made for the year 2022 celebrating the 90th birthday of Mr. Eero Aarnio. Kindly note that Mini KISU is a decoration element, not a toy.

Delivery time is 1-2 weeks. Mini KISU has a 14 day exchange and return policy.

all.Name: Mushroom
all.Body:
The Mushroom is one of Eero’s oldest designs and in its fibreglass form is part of the same design family that includes the Ball Chair, Pastil and Tomato. It can be used as a stool or a small table. The fibreglass Mushroom was designed in 1967 by Eero Aarnio.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

all.Name: Parabel
all.Body:
The Parabel was designed in 1993 by Eero Aarnio, and first shown at the International Furniture Fair in Cologne, Germany in January 2002. The table is made of fibreglass and comes in two sizes; large and oval. It is only available in white, the colour Eero specified to best showcase its sculptural details.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

all.Name: Pastil
all.Body:
Eero Aarnio made the first prototype of the Pastil chair out of polystyrene, which helped him to verify the measurements, ergonomics and rocking ability. In 1968 he received the American Industrial Award for its comfortable form and unique aesthetic. This 'sweetie' was designed in 1967.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

all.Name: Pony
all.Body:
Pony is a friendly and characterful addition to any room, but as always, it was designed first and foremost to provide a comfortable seat. Pony has a moulded foam body, feet and ears which are all connected by a tube frame and upholstered in a stretch fabric. Pony chair was designed in 1973 by Eero Aarnio.

We are happy to provide you fabric samples to help you decide the perfect colour for your Pony. You can find our contact information here.

all.Name: Rattan Mushroom
all.Body:
The Rattan Mushroom was designed by Eero Aarnio in 1961 and it was the very first stool made by the Finnish innovator. The rattan Mushroom stool was the first commercial success by Eero Aarnio, presented at the Cologne Furniture Fair in 1962. The Mushroom is a multifunctional furniture piece, as it works both as a stool as well as a small table. The functionality and neutral aesthetic make it a perfect addition to any interior decoration. 

The Mushroom is made of woven rattan with a rattan base. Available for showroom pick-up only.

The rattan Mushroom stool was the first commercial success by Eero Aarnio, presented at the Cologne Furniture Fair in 1962. The Mushroom is a multifunctional furniture piece, as it works both as a stool as well as a small table. The functionality and neutral aesthetic make it a perfect addition to any interior decoration. 

The Mushroom is made of woven rattan with a rattan base. Available for showroom pick-up only.

all.Name: Screw
all.Body:
Eero’s approach to industrial design has often seen simple and hidden forms become real and visible objects. Screws are used in most pieces of furniture – but the Screw table loses its hardware association and becomes part of a household in a new way. It is available in two sizes and three colours. The Screw was designed in 1991 by Eero Aarnio.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

all.Name: Tomato
all.Body:
Eero has always been drawn to the circular form and is perhaps best known for his designs ‘without edges’. The Tomato chair combines three circles on a basic seat, with two as armrests, one stretched to be a comfortable back. It is made of fibreglass which makes it suitable for outdoor use as well. Tomato was designed in 1971 by Eero Aarnio.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

shop.Name: Ball Chair
shop.Body:
The Ball Chair was designed in 1963 and debuted at the Cologne Furniture Fair in 1966. The chair is one of the most famous and beloved classics of Finnish design and it was the international breakthrough of Eero Aarnio. The Ball Chair can be found in the collections of design museums around the world and it has starred in several movies, music videos and magazine covers.

The Ball Chair is made from fibreglass and upholstered with quality fabrics. There are 12 colour options to choose from.

We are happy to provide you fabric samples to help you decide the perfect colour for your Ball Chair. You can find our contact information here.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

shop.Name: Bubble
shop.Body:
The Bubble chair was designed by Eero Aarnio in 1968. According to Eero’s notes, the Bubble hangs from the ceiling because ‘there is no nice way to make a clear pedestal.’ It shares the same unique acoustics as the Ball Chair, a little cocoon that shields off the outside world.

The hanging Bubble chair is made from acrylic and solid stainless steel, and is available in four different leather options by Sørensen Leather.

We are happy to provide you leather samples to help you decide the perfect colour for your Bubble. You can find our contact information here.

shop.Name: Mini KISU
shop.Body:
Mini KISU introduces the iconic shape of our bestseller Kisu in a new ceramic material in two luxurious colours - gold and platinum. The golden KISU is a limited series of 1500 pieces made for the year 2022 celebrating the 90th birthday of Mr. Eero Aarnio. Kindly note that Mini KISU is a decoration element, not a toy.

Delivery time is 1-2 weeks. Mini KISU has a 14 day exchange and return policy.

shop.Name: Pastil
shop.Body:
Eero Aarnio made the first prototype of the Pastil chair out of polystyrene, which helped him to verify the measurements, ergonomics and rocking ability. In 1968 he received the American Industrial Award for its comfortable form and unique aesthetic. This 'sweetie' was designed in 1967.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

shop.Name: Kisu
shop.Body:
Kisu is the newest addition to our collection, designed by Eero Aarnio in 2020. Kisu is a decorative piece of interior design suitable for both indoors and outdoors. This cat is made of polyethylene and available in two colours, black and white. The black Kisu is produced 100% of regenerated polyethylene made from the factory's own defected products and waste material. Kindly note that Kisu is a decoration element, not a toy.

Delivery time is two weeks. Kisu has a 14 days exchange and return policy.

shop.Name: Leather Ball Chair
shop.Body:
The Ball Chair designed in 1963 by Eero Aarnio is one of the most iconic pieces of furniture of the past decades. Still today, it has remained as fresh and modern as ever. For years we have received requests about the possibility of upholstering the iconic Ball chair with leather. The premium version of the iconic classic is finally available. The Leather Ball Chair is upholstered with the finest and softest leather, enabling the most elegant and luxurious finishing touch. Get your own upgraded classic now, and bring the look that radiates luxury to your living room.

We are happy to provide you leather samples.
You can find our contact information here.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

shop.Name: Pony
shop.Body:
Pony is a friendly and characterful addition to any room, but as always, it was designed first and foremost to provide a comfortable seat. Pony has a moulded foam body, feet and ears which are all connected by a tube frame and upholstered in a stretch fabric. Pony chair was designed in 1973 by Eero Aarnio.

We are happy to provide you fabric samples to help you decide the perfect colour for your Pony. You can find our contact information here.

shop.Name: Formula
shop.Body:
The Formula chair is similar to the classic Pastil, with an additional backrest. It is the response to Eero’s own personal challenge to combine the sculptural elements of his earlier fibreglass designs with the ergonomic solutions for comfortable seating. Formula was designed in 1998 by Eero Aarnio.

The Formula is available in three colors: black, white and red.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

shop.Name: Rattan Mushroom
shop.Body:
The Rattan Mushroom was designed by Eero Aarnio in 1961 and it was the very first stool made by the Finnish innovator. The rattan Mushroom stool was the first commercial success by Eero Aarnio, presented at the Cologne Furniture Fair in 1962. The Mushroom is a multifunctional furniture piece, as it works both as a stool as well as a small table. The functionality and neutral aesthetic make it a perfect addition to any interior decoration. 

The Mushroom is made of woven rattan with a rattan base. Available for showroom pick-up only.

shop.Name: Mushroom
shop.Body:
The Mushroom is one of Eero’s oldest designs and in its fibreglass form is part of the same design family that includes the Ball Chair, Pastil and Tomato. It can be used as a stool or a small table. The fibreglass Mushroom was designed in 1967 by Eero Aarnio.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

shop.Name: Tomato
shop.Body:
Eero has always been drawn to the circular form and is perhaps best known for his designs ‘without edges’. The Tomato chair combines three circles on a basic seat, with two as armrests, one stretched to be a comfortable back. It is made of fibreglass which makes it suitable for outdoor use as well. Tomato was designed in 1971 by Eero Aarnio.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

shop.Name: Copacabana
shop.Body:
The Copacabana was designed to go with the Pastil chair; the curved line of the table suits the round shape of the chair. Copacabana can be used as both a table or a small bench. The material makes it suitable for outdoor use. Eero Aarnio designed Copacabana in 1991.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

shop.Name: Gift Card
shop.Body: How about gifting the freedom to decide which of our classics speaks to you the most? Purchase a gift card for a friend or use it yourself for your favourite Original! You can use the Aarnio Originals gift card for payment in our aarniooriginals.com web shop. Gift card is delivered to your email address, and includes a unique code that is valid for payment in our web shop for 12 months after purchase. When you want to use gift card for payment, you will need to add your gift card code at checkout, and the value of the gift card will be deducted from the total amount. In case a part of the gift card’s value is left unused, you can use what is left with your next order.

frontpage.Name: Ball Chair
frontpage.Body:
The Ball Chair was designed in 1963 and debuted at the Cologne Furniture Fair in 1966. The chair is one of the most famous and beloved classics of Finnish design and it was the international breakthrough of Eero Aarnio. The Ball Chair can be found in the collections of design museums around the world and it has starred in several movies, music videos and magazine covers.

The Ball Chair is made from fibreglass and upholstered with quality fabrics. There are 12 colour options to choose from.

We are happy to provide you fabric samples to help you decide the perfect colour for your Ball Chair. You can find our contact information here.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

frontpage.Name: Bubble
frontpage.Body:
The Bubble chair was designed by Eero Aarnio in 1968. According to Eero’s notes, the Bubble hangs from the ceiling because ‘there is no nice way to make a clear pedestal.’ It shares the same unique acoustics as the Ball Chair, a little cocoon that shields off the outside world.

The hanging Bubble chair is made from acrylic and solid stainless steel, and is available in four different leather options by Sørensen Leather.

We are happy to provide you leather samples to help you decide the perfect colour for your Bubble. You can find our contact information here.

frontpage.Name: Leather Ball Chair
frontpage.Body:
The Ball Chair designed in 1963 by Eero Aarnio is one of the most iconic pieces of furniture of the past decades. Still today, it has remained as fresh and modern as ever. For years we have received requests about the possibility of upholstering the iconic Ball chair with leather. The premium version of the iconic classic is finally available. The Leather Ball Chair is upholstered with the finest and softest leather, enabling the most elegant and luxurious finishing touch. Get your own upgraded classic now, and bring the look that radiates luxury to your living room.

We are happy to provide you leather samples.
You can find our contact information here.

Delivery time at the moment is 6 weeks.

frontpage.Name: Rattan Mushroom
frontpage.Body:
The Rattan Mushroom was designed by Eero Aarnio in 1961 and it was the very first stool made by the Finnish innovator. The rattan Mushroom stool was the first commercial success by Eero Aarnio, presented at the Cologne Furniture Fair in 1962. The Mushroom is a multifunctional furniture piece, as it works both as a stool as well as a small table. The functionality and neutral aesthetic make it a perfect addition to any interior decoration. 

The Mushroom is made of woven rattan with a rattan base. Available for showroom pick-up only.
